title: Grilled Salmon Sauce
directions: There's a certain art to making a recipe sound very easy and approachable, but at the same time not insulting people's intelligence.
ingredients: 4 (8-oz) grilled salmon filets (by the way, fish was salted before grilling)
1 tablespoon sambal chili sauce, or any spicy Asian-style chili paste
1 tablespoon finely grated fresh ginger or ginger puree
4 cloves garlic, very finely crushed or minced
1 teaspoon soy sauce, or to taste
